scripts.dev: npm run kill-ports && npm run setup-database && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND,ELECTRON" --prefix-colors "blue,green,yellow" "npm run backend" "npm run frontend" "npm run electron"
scripts.backend: cd backend && (python -m uvicorn main:app --reload --port 8000 --host 0.0.0.0 || python3 -m uvicorn main:app --reload --port 8000 --host 0.0.0.0)
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install
